topics.title: Scalability
topics.note: Handling growth. Vertical (scale up hardware) vs Horizontal (scale out nodes).

topics.title: Availability
topics.note: Uptime. Measured in nines (99.999%). Does the system respond?

topics.title: Reliability
topics.note: Correctness. Does the system function correctly and preserve data integrity?

topics.title: CAP Theorem
topics.note: Consistency, Availability, Partition Tolerance. You can only pick 2 (usually AP or CP).

topics.title: Consistent Hashing
topics.note: Distributing keys so that adding/removing servers only impacts K/N keys. Vital for caches.

topics.title: SPOF (Single Point of Failure)
topics.note: A component whose failure stops the entire system. Redundancy is the fix.

topics.title: Failover
topics.note: Automatically switching to a backup server when the primary fails.

topics.title: Fault Tolerance
topics.note: The ability of a system to continue operating properly in the event of component failure.

topics.title: OSI Model
topics.note: 7 layers of networking. Focus on L4 (Transport) and L7 (Application).

topics.title: IP Addresses
topics.note: IPv4 vs IPv6. Public vs Private subnets.

topics.title: DNS
topics.note: Translating domain names to IPs. A Records, CNAME, TTL.

topics.title: Proxy vs Reverse Proxy
topics.note: Forward Proxy protects client (VPN); Reverse Proxy protects server (Load Balancer).

topics.title: HTTP/HTTPS
topics.note: Stateless protocol of the web. SSL/TLS handshakes for security.

topics.title: TCP vs UDP
topics.note: TCP: Reliable, ordered (Email). UDP: Fast, lossy (Video/Gaming).

topics.title: Load Balancing
topics.note: Distributing traffic across servers. L4 vs L7 balancing.

topics.title: Checksums
topics.note: Error detection to ensure data integrity during transmission.

topics.title: APIs
topics.note: Contracts between software components.

topics.title: API Gateway
topics.note: Single entry point for backends. Handles Auth, Rate Limiting, Routing.

topics.title: REST vs GraphQL
topics.note: REST: Standard resources. GraphQL: Flexible queries (avoids over-fetching).

topics.title: WebSockets
topics.note: Full-duplex communication for real-time apps (Chat).

topics.title: Webhooks
topics.note: User-defined HTTP callbacks (Push notifications for events).

topics.title: Idempotency
topics.note: Making sure a retried operation (like payment) doesn't execute twice.

topics.title: Rate Limiting
topics.note: Controlling traffic rate to prevent abuse (Token Bucket algorithm).

topics.title: API Design
topics.note: Naming conventions, versioning, and pagination strategies.

topics.title: ACID Transactions
topics.note: Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability. Required for banking.

topics.title: SQL vs NoSQL
topics.note: Relational (Structured/JOINs) vs Non-Relational (Flexible/Scale-out).

topics.title: Database Indexes
topics.note: Data structures (B-Tree) to speed up reads at the cost of slower writes.

topics.title: Database Sharding
topics.note: Partitioning data across multiple machines based on a key.

topics.title: Data Replication
topics.note: Copying data for redundancy. Master-Slave or Multi-Master.

topics.title: Database Scaling
topics.note: Strategies to handle more data: Vertical scaling or Read Replicas.

topics.title: Databases Types
topics.note: Document, Key-Value, Columnar, Graph.

topics.title: Bloom Filters
topics.note: Probabilistic structure to quickly test if an element is NOT in a set.

topics.title: Database Architectures
topics.note: Federation, Replication, and partitioning strategies.

topics.title: Caching 101
topics.note: Storing expensive query results in temporary storage (RAM).

topics.title: Caching Strategies
topics.note: Cache-Aside, Write-Through, Write-Around, Write-Back.

topics.title: Cache Eviction Policies
topics.note: Deciding what to delete when full: LRU (Least Recently Used), LFU.

topics.title: Distributed Caching
topics.note: Sharing cache across multiple servers (Redis/Memcached).

topics.title: Content Delivery Network (CDN)
topics.note: Geographically distributed servers for static content (images/video).

topics.title: Pub/Sub
topics.note: Publishers send messages to topics; Subscribers listen. Decoupled.

topics.title: Message Queues
topics.note: Buffer for async processing. RabbitMQ, SQS.

topics.title: Change Data Capture (CDC)
topics.note: Streaming DB changes to other systems (e.g., Debezium).

topics.title: HeartBeats
topics.note: Signals sent to indicate a node is alive.

topics.title: Service Discovery
topics.note: How microservices find each other (Consul, Eureka).

topics.title: Consensus Algorithms
topics.note: Agreeing on truth in a cluster. Paxos, Raft.

topics.title: Distributed Locking
topics.note: Managing access to shared resources across nodes (Redis Redlock).

topics.title: Microservices Guidelines
topics.note: Single Responsibility, Independent Deployment, Decentralized Data.

topics.title: Gossip Protocol
topics.note: Peer-to-peer communication for cluster state (Cassandra).

topics.title: Circuit Breaker
topics.note: Stopping requests to a failing service to prevent cascading failure.

topics.title: Disaster Recovery
topics.note: Strategies to recover from catastrophic failure (RTO/RPO).

topics.title: Distributed Tracing
topics.note: Tracking requests across microservices (Jaeger, Zipkin).

topics.title: Client-Server Architecture
topics.note: Classic model. Client requests, Server responds.

topics.title: Microservices Architecture
topics.note: App as a suite of small, independently deployable services.

topics.title: Serverless Architecture
topics.note: FaaS (AWS Lambda). No server management, pay per execution.

topics.title: Event-Driven Architecture
topics.note: Components react to events rather than direct calls.

topics.title: Peer-to-Peer (P2P) Architecture
topics.note: Decentralized networks where nodes are both client and server (BitTorrent).

topics.title: Vertical vs Horizontal Scaling
topics.note: Bigger machine vs More machines.

topics.title: Concurrency vs Parallelism
topics.note: Dealing with many things at once vs Doing many things at once.

topics.title: Long Polling vs WebSockets
topics.note: Client asking repeatedly vs Open connection.

topics.title: Batch vs Stream Processing
topics.note: Processing large historical data vs Real-time data.

topics.title: Stateful vs Stateless Design
topics.note: Server remembers user vs Server treats every request as new.

topics.title: Strong vs Eventual Consistency
topics.note: Immediate data accuracy vs Speed/Availability.

topics.title: Read-Through vs Write-Through Cache
topics.note: Loading cache on miss vs Updating cache on write.

topics.title: Push vs Pull Architecture
topics.note: Sending data to client vs Client requesting data.

topics.title: REST vs RPC
topics.note: Resource oriented vs Action oriented.

topics.title: Synchronous vs Asynchronous
topics.note: Blocking wait vs Non-blocking fire-and-forget.

topics.title: Latency vs Throughput
topics.note: Response time vs Requests per second.

topics.title: Design URL Shortener
topics.note: TinyURL. Hash functions, Base62, DB lookups.

topics.title: Design Autocomplete
topics.note: Tries, Typeahead, Top-K problems.

topics.title: Design Load Balancer
topics.note: Algorithms (Round Robin), Health checks.

topics.title: Design CDN
topics.note: Caching proxies, Geo-DNS.

topics.title: Design Parking Garage
topics.note: Object Modeling, Counters, Concurrency.

topics.title: Design Vending Machine
topics.note: State Machine pattern.

topics.title: Design Distributed Key-Value Store
topics.note: Dynamo-style. Partitioning, Replication.

topics.title: Design Distributed Cache
topics.note: LRU Eviction, Consistent Hashing.

topics.title: Design Authentication System
topics.note: OAuth, JWT, Session management.

topics.title: Design UPI
topics.note: Transactional integrity, ACID, NPCI switch.

topics.title: Design WhatsApp
topics.note: Chat. WebSockets, Message Ordering, Offline queue.

topics.title: Design Spotify
topics.note: Streaming audio, CDNs, DRM.

topics.title: Design Instagram
topics.note: Image storage, Feed generation (Fan-out).

topics.title: Design Notification Service
topics.note: Queues, 3rd party providers, Retry logic.

topics.title: Design Distributed Job Scheduler
topics.note: Cron jobs, Leader election, Task intent.

topics.title: Design Tinder
topics.note: Geospatial, Swiping logic (Active users).

topics.title: Design Facebook
topics.note: Social Graph, News Feed, Privacy.

topics.title: Design Twitter
topics.note: Heavy Read scaling, Fan-out strategies.

topics.title: Design Reddit
topics.note: Voting logic, Tree-structured comments.

topics.title: Design Netflix
topics.note: Video transcoding, Adaptive bitrate streaming.

topics.title: Design Youtube
topics.note: Video upload pipeline, Deduplication.

topics.title: Design Google Search
topics.note: Crawling, Indexing, Ranking.

topics.title: Design E-commerce (Amazon)
topics.note: Catalog, Cart, Inventory management (Locking).

topics.title: Design TikTok
topics.note: Recommendation Engine, Low latency video.

topics.title: Design Shopify
topics.note: Multi-tenant architecture.

topics.title: Design Airbnb
topics.note: Booking availability, Calendar management.

topics.title: Design Rate Limiter
topics.note: Distributed counters, Sliding window.

topics.title: Design Distributed Queue (Kafka)
topics.note: Log-based storage, Partitions, Consumer groups.

topics.title: Design Flight Booking
topics.note: Heavy consistency, Database locking.

topics.title: Design Online Code Editor
topics.note: Operational Transformation (OT), CRDTs.

topics.title: Design Analytics Platform
topics.note: Time-series DBs, Aggregation pipelines.

topics.title: Design Payment System
topics.note: Double-entry ledger, Reconciliation.

topics.title: Design Digital Wallet
topics.note: Balance transfer, Concurrency safety.

topics.title: Design Yelp (LBS)
topics.note: QuadTrees, Radius search.

topics.title: Design Uber
topics.note: Driver matching, Location tracking, State machines.

topics.title: Design Food Delivery (Doordash)
topics.note: Logistics, 3-way marketplace (User-Rest-Dasher).

topics.title: Design Google Docs
topics.note: Real-time collaboration, OT/CRDTs.

topics.title: Design Google Maps
topics.note: Tiling, Routing algorithms (Dijkstra/A*).

topics.title: Design Zoom
topics.note: WebRTC, UDP, Video compression.

topics.title: Design Distributed Counter
topics.note: Write-heavy scaling, Sharded counters.

topics.title: Design Dropbox
topics.note: File chunking, Sync algorithms, Block storage.

topics.title: Design Ticket Booking (BookMyShow)
topics.note: Handling 'The Thundering Herd' problem.

topics.title: Design Distributed Web Crawler
topics.note: URL Frontier, Politeness, Duplicate detection.

topics.title: Design Code Deployment System
topics.note: Build pipelines, Artifact storage.

topics.title: Design S3 (Cloud Storage)
topics.note: Blob storage, Erasure coding, Metadata separation.

topics.title: Design Distributed Locking Service
topics.note: Chubby/ZooKeeper architecture.

topics.title: Design Slack
topics.note: Channel architecture, Presence.

topics.title: Design Live Comments
topics.note: High throughput writes, Real-time updates.

topics.title: Discord's Trillions of Messages
topics.note: Moving from MongoDB to Cassandra to ScyllaDB for massive write throughput.

topics.title: Netflix In-Video Search
topics.note: Indexing video frames and extracting metadata for search.

topics.title: Canva Media Uploads
topics.note: Scaling storage and upload pipelines for 50M assets/day.

topics.title: Airbnb Payments
topics.note: Implementing idempotency and distributed transactions in payments.

topics.title: Stripe Payments API
topics.note: API design, versioning, and maintaining backward compatibility.

topics.title: Slack Real-Time Messaging
topics.note: Using main edge servers and message servers for low latency chat.

topics.title: Paxos
topics.note: The original (and hard to understand) consensus algorithm.

topics.title: MapReduce
topics.note: Google's framework for processing massive datasets (Batch).

topics.title: Google File System (GFS)
topics.note: The precursor to HDFS. Big data storage architecture.

topics.title: Dynamo
topics.note: Amazon's key-value store. Introduced Consistent Hashing & Vector Clocks.

topics.title: Kafka
topics.note: Log-centric messaging system for high throughput.

topics.title: Spanner
topics.note: Google's globally distributed database with TrueTime (Atomic Clocks).

topics.title: Bigtable
topics.note: Sparse, distributed, multi-dimensional sorted map (NoSQL ancestor).

topics.title: ZooKeeper
topics.note: Coordination service for distributed apps (Configuration, Naming).

topics.title: LSM-Tree
topics.note: Log-Structured Merge-Tree. The storage engine behind Cassandra/RocksDB.

topics.title: Chubby Lock Service
topics.note: Google's coarse-grained locking service.
